mapper.select: SELECT SUM(cancelTotal) AS 'failTotal' ,SUM(successTotal) AS 'sucTotal' ,SUM(commissionTotal) AS 'cmTotal' ,result.ym AS 'ymDate' from ( SELECT SUM(f.b_cancel) AS 'cancelTotal' , 0 AS 'successTotal' ,SUM(f.b_cancel) AS 'commissionTotal' ,DATE_FORMAT(f.tr_fail_date,'%y년 %m월') AS 'ym' FROM tb_trade_fail AS f GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(f.tr_fail_date,'%y%m') UNION SELECT 0 AS 'cancelTotal' ,SUM(o.c_trade_cm) AS 'successTotal' ,SUM(o.c_trade_cm) AS 'commissionTotal' ,DATE_FORMAT(i.b_mo_date,'%y년 %m월') AS 'ym' FROM tb_trade_payment_out AS o LEFT join tb_trade_priority AS r ON o.tr_pr_code = r.tr_pr_code LEFT JOIN tb_trade_payment_in AS i ON r.tr_pr_code = i.tr_pr_code GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(i.b_mo_date,'%y%m') ) AS result GROUP BY ym;

SELECT r.announced_code AS announcedCode , r.announced_title AS announcedTitle , if(r.b_type_code=1,'발전소','부품') AS bType , m_id , o.c_trade_cm , i.b_mo_date AS bMoDate FROM tb_trade_payment_out AS o LEFT join tb_trade_priority AS r ON o.tr_pr_code = r.tr_pr_code LEFT JOIN tb_trade_payment_in AS i ON r.tr_pr_code = i.tr_pr_code ORDER BY i.b_mo_date

SELECT tr_fail_code AS trFailCode , related_code AS relatedCode , tr_fail_type AS trFailType , m_id AS mId , announcedCode , announcedTitle , bType , bankName , accountNumber , paymentName , tr_fail_basis AS trFailBasis , b_cancel_rate AS bCancelRate , b_cancel AS bCancel , tr_fail_date AS trFailDate FROM ( SELECT tr_fail_code , related_code , tr_fail_type , a.m_id , b.announced_code AS announcedCode , b.announced_title AS announcedTitle , if(b.b_type_code=1,'발전소','부품') AS bType , e.m_account_bank_name AS bankName , e.m_account_number AS accountNumber , e.m_payment_name AS paymentName , tr_fail_basis , b_cancel_rate , b_cancel , tr_fail_date FROM tb_trade_fail AS a INNER JOIN tb_trade_priority AS b ON a.related_code = b.tr_pr_code LEFT JOIN tb_bid_list AS e ON b.b_code = e.b_code UNION ALL SELECT tr_fail_code , related_code , tr_fail_type , m_id , d.announced_code AS announcedCode , d.announced_title AS announcedTitle , if(d.b_type_code=1,'발전소','부품') AS bType , c.m_account_bank_name AS bankName , c.m_account_number AS accountNumber , c.m_payment_name AS paymentName , tr_fail_basis , b_cancel_rate , b_cancel , tr_fail_date FROM tb_trade_fail AS a INNER JOIN tb_trade_payment_in AS c ON a.related_code = c.tr_payin_code LEFT JOIN tb_trade_priority AS d ON c.tr_pr_code = d.tr_pr_code ) AS result ORDER BY tr_fail_date

SELECT tr_payout_code , a.tr_pr_code , m_id , b.announced_code AS announcedCode , b.announced_title AS announcedTitle , if(b.b_type_code=1,'발전소','부품') AS bType , tr_payout_price , s_commission_rate , c_trade_cm , tr_payout_price_real , tr_payout_bank , tr_payout_account , tr_payout_account_check , tr_payout_account_name , tr_payout_date , a.tr_payout_check , tr_payout_wd_date , b_mo_code FROM tb_trade_payment_out AS a LEFT JOIN tb_trade_priority AS b ON a.tr_pr_code = b.tr_pr_code

SELECT tr_dep_code , a.b_code , a.m_id , b.announced_code AS announcedCode , b.b_title AS bTitle , if(b.b_type_code=1,'발전소','부품') AS bTypeCode , a.b_deposit , tr_dep_deposit , a.m_account_bank_name , a.m_account_number , tr_dep_account_check , m_account_name , tr_dep_date , tr_dep_check , tr_dep_wd_date , a.b_mo_code FROM tb_trade_deposit_out AS a LEFT JOIN tb_bid_list AS b ON a.b_code = b.b_code

SELECT tr_payin_code, tr_pr_code, b_code, announced_code, m_id_seller, m_id_buyer, b_price, s_deposit_rate, b_deposit, tr_payin_price, s_commission_rate, c_trade_cm, tr_payin_date1, tr_payin_date2, tr_payin_check, b_mo_code, b_mo_date, tr_payin_status, m_account_bank_name, m_account_number, m_payment_name FROM tb_trade_payment_in AS tp WHERE b_code = #{bCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_trade_payment_in SET m_account_bank_name=#{mAccountBankName}, m_account_number=#{mAccountNumber}, m_payment_name=#{mPaymentName} WHERE b_code=#{bCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_trade_deposit_out (tr_dep_code, b_code, m_id, b_deposit, tr_dep_deposit, m_account_bank_name, m_account_number, m_account_name, tr_dep_date) VALUES (sf_tr_dep_code(), #{bCode}, #{mId}, #{bDeposit}, #{bDeposit}, #{mAccountBankName}, #{mAccountNumber}, #{mAccountName}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT tr_dep_code, b_code, m_id, b_deposit, tr_dep_deposit, m_account_bank_name, m_account_number, tr_dep_account_check, m_account_name, tr_dep_date, tr_dep_check, tr_dep_wd_date, b_mo_code FROM tb_trade_deposit_out WHERE b_code=#{bCode}
